GET /radar/ct/authorities.description: Retrieves a list of certificate authorities.

parameters.description: Limits the number of objects returned in the response.
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Limits the number of objects returned in the response.

parameters.description: Skips the specified number of objects before fetching the results.
parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Skips the specified number of objects before fetching the results.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

certificateRecordType.description: Specifies the type of certificate in the trust chain.

country.description: The two-letter ISO country code where the CA organization is based.

countryName.description: The full country name corresponding to the country code.

name.description: The full name of the certificate authority (CA).

owner.description: The organization that owns and operates the CA.

parentName.description: The name of the parent/root certificate authority that issued this intermediate certificate.

parentSha256Fingerprint.description: The SHA-256 fingerprint of the parent certificate.

revocationStatus.description: The current revocation status of a Certificate Authority (CA) certificate.

sha256Fingerprint.description: The SHA-256 fingerprint of the intermediate certificate.

parameters.description: Certificate authority SHA256 fingerprint.
parameters.name: ca_slug

schema.description: Certificate authority SHA256 fingerprint.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

appleStatus.description: The inclusion status of a Certificate Authority (CA) in the trust store.

authorityKeyIdentifier.description: The authorityKeyIdentifier value extracted from the certificate PEM.

certificateRecordType.description: Specifies the type of certificate in the trust chain.

chromeStatus.description: The inclusion status of a Certificate Authority (CA) in the trust store.

country.description: The two-letter ISO country code where the CA organization is based.

countryName.description: The full country name corresponding to the country code.

microsoftStatus.description: The inclusion status of a Certificate Authority (CA) in the trust store.

mozillaStatus.description: The inclusion status of a Certificate Authority (CA) in the trust store.

name.description: The full name of the certificate authority (CA).

owner.description: The organization that owns and operates the CA.

parentName.description: The name of the parent/root certificate authority that issued this intermediate certificate.

parentSha256Fingerprint.description: The SHA-256 fingerprint of the parent certificate.

certificateRecordType.description: Specifies the type of certificate in the trust chain.

name.description: The full name of the certificate authority (CA).

revocationStatus.description: The current revocation status of a Certificate Authority (CA) certificate.

sha256Fingerprint.description: The SHA-256 fingerprint of the intermediate certificate.

revocationStatus.description: The current revocation status of a Certificate Authority (CA) certificate.

sha256Fingerprint.description: The SHA-256 fingerprint of the intermediate certificate.

subjectKeyIdentifier.description: The subjectKeyIdentifier value extracted from the certificate PEM.

validFrom.description: The start date of the certificate’s validity period (ISO format).

validTo.description: The end date of the certificate’s validity period (ISO format).

GET /radar/ct/logs.description: Retrieves a list of certificate logs.

parameters.description: Limits the number of objects returned in the response.
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Limits the number of objects returned in the response.

parameters.description: Skips the specified number of objects before fetching the results.
parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Skips the specified number of objects before fetching the results.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

api.description: The API standard that the certificate log follows.

description.description: A brief description of the certificate log.

endExclusive.description: The end date and time for when the log will stop accepting certificates.

operator.description: The organization responsible for operating the certificate log.

slug.description: A URL-friendly, kebab-case identifier for the certificate log.

startInclusive.description: The start date and time for when the log starts accepting certificates.

state.description: The current state of the certificate log. More details about log states can be found here: https://googlechrome.github.io/CertificateTransparency/log_states.html

stateTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the log state was last updated.

url.description: The URL for the certificate log.

GET /radar/ct/logs/{log_slug}.description: Retrieves the requested certificate log information.

parameters.description: Certificate log slug.
parameters.name: log_slug

schema.description: Certificate log slug.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

api.description: The API standard that the certificate log follows.

description.description: A brief description of the certificate log.

endExclusive.description: The end date and time for when the log will stop accepting certificates.

operator.description: The organization responsible for operating the certificate log.

performance.description: Log performance metrics, including averages and per-endpoint details.

endpoint.description: The certificate log endpoint names used in performance metrics.

description.description: A brief description of the certificate log.

endExclusive.description: The end date and time for when the log will stop accepting certificates.

slug.description: A URL-friendly, kebab-case identifier for the certificate log.

startInclusive.description: The start date and time for when the log starts accepting certificates.

state.description: The current state of the certificate log. More details about log states can be found here: https://googlechrome.github.io/CertificateTransparency/log_states.html

slug.description: A URL-friendly, kebab-case identifier for the certificate log.

startInclusive.description: The start date and time for when the log starts accepting certificates.

state.description: The current state of the certificate log. More details about log states can be found here: https://googlechrome.github.io/CertificateTransparency/log_states.html

stateTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the log state was last updated.

url.description: The URL for the certificate log.

GET /radar/ct/summary/{dimension}.description: Retrieves an aggregated summary of certificates grouped by the specified dimension.

parameters.description: Specifies the certificate attribute by which to group the results.
parameters.name: dimension

schema.description: Specifies the certificate attribute by which to group the results.

parameters.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.
parameters.name: name

schema.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.

parameters.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).
parameters.name: dateRange

schema.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

parameters.description: Start of the date range.
parameters.name: dateStart

schema.description: Start of the date range.

parameters.description: End of the date range (inclusive).
parameters.name: dateEnd

schema.description: End of the date range (inclusive).

parameters.description: Limits the number of objects per group to the top items within the specified time range. When item count exceeds the limit, extra items appear grouped under an "other" category.
parameters.name: limitPerGroup

schema.description: Limits the number of objects per group to the top items within the specified time range. When item count exceeds the limit, extra items appear grouped under an "other" category.

parameters.description: Filters results by certificate authority.
parameters.name: ca

schema.description: Filters results by certificate authority.

parameters.description: Filters results by certificate authority owner.
parameters.name: caOwner

schema.description: Filters results by certificate authority owner.

parameters.description: Filters results by certificate duration.
parameters.name: duration

schema.description: Filters results by certificate duration.

parameters.description: Filters results by entry type (certificate vs. pre-certificate).
parameters.name: entryType

schema.description: Filters results by entry type (certificate vs. pre-certificate).

parameters.description: Filters results by expiration status (expired vs. valid).
parameters.name: expirationStatus

schema.description: Filters results by expiration status (expired vs. valid).

parameters.description: Filters results based on whether the certificates are bound to specific IP addresses.
parameters.name: hasIps

schema.description: Filters results based on whether the certificates are bound to specific IP addresses.

parameters.description: Filters results based on whether the certificates contain wildcard domains.
parameters.name: hasWildcards

schema.description: Filters results based on whether the certificates contain wildcard domains.

parameters.description: Filters results by certificate log.
parameters.name: log

schema.description: Filters results by certificate log.

parameters.description: Filters results by certificate log API (RFC6962 vs. static).
parameters.name: logApi

schema.description: Filters results by certificate log API (RFC6962 vs. static).

parameters.description: Filters results by certificate log operator.
parameters.name: logOperator

schema.description: Filters results by certificate log operator.

parameters.description: Filters results by public key algorithm.
parameters.name: publicKeyAlgorithm

schema.description: Filters results by public key algorithm.

parameters.description: Filters results by signature algorithm.
parameters.name: signatureAlgorithm

schema.description: Filters results by signature algorithm.

parameters.description: Filters results by top-level domain.
parameters.name: tld

schema.description: Filters results by top-level domain.

parameters.description: Filters results by validation level.
parameters.name: validationLevel

schema.description: Filters results by validation level.

parameters.description: Specifies whether to filter out duplicate certificates and pre-certificates. Set to true for unique entries only.
parameters.name: uniqueEntries

schema.description: Specifies whether to filter out duplicate certificates and pre-certificates. Set to true for unique entries only.

parameters.description: Normalization method applied to the results. Refer to [Normalization methods](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/normalization/).
parameters.name: normalization

schema.description: Normalization method applied to the results. Refer to [Normalization methods](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/normalization/).

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

items.description: Annotation associated with the result (e.g. outage or other type of event).

isInstantaneous.description: Whether event is a single point in time or a time range.

level.description: Provides an indication of how much confidence Cloudflare has in the data.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last dataset update.

normalization.description: Normalization method applied to the results. Refer to [Normalization methods](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/normalization/).

parameters.description: Aggregation interval of the results (e.g., in 15 minutes or 1 hour intervals). Refer to [Aggregation intervals](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/aggregation-intervals/).
parameters.name: aggInterval

schema.description: Aggregation interval of the results (e.g., in 15 minutes or 1 hour intervals). Refer to [Aggregation intervals](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/aggregation-intervals/).
